taskOptions.description: Generate a consensus for each strand.
taskOptions.name: By Strand CCS

taskOptions.description: Draft consensus generation algorithm
taskOptions.name: Draft consensus generation algorithm

taskOptions.description: Maximum fraction of subreads dropped by polishing (not input filters) before skipping ZMW.
taskOptions.name: Maximum Dropped Fraction

taskOptions.description: Maximum length of subreads to use for generating CCS.
taskOptions.name: Maximum Subread Length

taskOptions.description: Maximum number of subreads used to generate PoA sequence, 0 means unlimited.
taskOptions.name: Maximum PoA coverage

taskOptions.description: Minimum identity to the POA to use a subread. 0 disables this filter.
taskOptions.name: Minimum Identity

taskOptions.description: Minimum length of subreads to use for generating CCS.
taskOptions.name: Minimum Subread Length

taskOptions.description: Minimum number of subreads required to generate CCS.
taskOptions.name: Minimum Number of Passes

taskOptions.description: Minimum predicted accuracy in [0, 1].
taskOptions.name: Minimum Predicted Accuracy

taskOptions.description: Minimum read score of input subreads.
taskOptions.name: Minimal Read Score

taskOptions.description: Minimum SNR of input subreads.
taskOptions.name: Minimum SNR

taskOptions.description: Minimum z-score to use a subread. NaN disables this filter (RS II only).
taskOptions.name: Minimum Z Score

taskOptions.description: Path to a model file or directory containing model files.
taskOptions.name: Model(s) Path

taskOptions.description: Name of chemistry or model to use, overriding default selection.
taskOptions.name: Model Override

taskOptions.name: Polish CCS

taskOptions.name: Report File Output

taskOptions.name: Emit individual QVs

taskOptions.name: Consolidate .bam

taskOptions.description: Number of .bam files to create in consolidate mode
taskOptions.name: Number of .bam files

taskOptions.description: If other than 0 or 1, this will add a filter to the input dataset to sample a random selection of ZMWs instead of running over the full dataset.  For example, a downsample factor of 10 means that 1/10th (10%) of ZMWs will be used.
taskOptions.name: Downsampling Factor

taskOptions.description: A semicolon or comma separated list of other filters to add to the DataSet
taskOptions.name: Filters to add to the DataSet

taskOptions.description: Minimum length of subreads
taskOptions.name: Minimum subread length

taskOptions.description: Option use_run_design_uuid description
taskOptions.name: Option use_run_design_uuid

taskOptions.description: Sample name for all read groups. Defaults, in order of precedence: SM field in input read group, biosample name, well sample name, "UnnamedSample".
taskOptions.name: Sample Name

taskOptions.description: Process HQ region of each ZMW, subreadset.xml input required (activates UNROLLED preset).
taskOptions.name: Process HQ Regions

taskOptions.description: Pick one read per ZMW of median length.
taskOptions.name: Pick One Read per ZMW of Median Length

taskOptions.description: Minimum alignment concordance in percent.
taskOptions.name: Minimum Concordance (%)

taskOptions.description: Minimum mapped read length in basepair.
taskOptions.name: Minimum Length (bp)

taskOptions.description: Memory per thread for sorting.
taskOptions.name: Memory per thread for sorting

taskOptions.description: One output BAM per sample.
taskOptions.name: Split by Sample

taskOptions.description: Remove all kinetic and extra QV tags. Output cannot be polished.
taskOptions.name: Strip Base Tags

taskOptions.description: Space-separated list of arguments to pbmm2 align. Allowed arguments: k, w, u, A, B, z, Z, r, o, O, e, E, L.
taskOptions.name: Override Options

taskOptions.description: Process ZMW Reads, subreadset.xml input required (activates UNROLLED preset).
taskOptions.name: Process ZMW Reads

taskOptions.description: If supplied, then try to use this number (max value = 40000) of regions per reference, otherwise the coverage summary report will optimize the number of regions in the case of many references.  Not compatible with a fixed region size.
taskOptions.name: Force the number of regions

taskOptions.description: Workaround for bug in unrolled alignment (NOT CUSTOMER-FACING)
taskOptions.name: Ignore negative-lenth alignments

taskOptions.description: Maximum number of contigs to plot in coverage report
taskOptions.name: Maximum number of contigs to plot

taskOptions.description: Upper limit for genomic region size (ignored if region_size is set explicitly)
taskOptions.name: Maximum region size

taskOptions.description: Desired number of genome regions in the summary statistics (used for guidance, not strict). Defaults to 1000
taskOptions.name: Number of regions

taskOptions.description: If supplied, used a fixed genomic region size
taskOptions.name: Region size
